department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Analysis of Failure Time Data
course.meeting_text: M., W., 10:30–12:20, and a weekly 90-minute lab.
course.description: Discusses the theoretical basis of concepts and methodologies associated with survival data and censoring, nonparametric tests, and competing risk models. Much of the theory is developed using counting processes and martingale methods.
course.prerequisites: Biostatistics 231, and Biostatistics 233, and Biostatistics 250, or signature of instructor required.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO244.
